parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.5</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns position of an object (alias of [[getPos]]) or location (alias of [[locationPosition]]). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[position]] object </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGLS]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[position]] location </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> location: [[Location]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [x,y,z], where z is <tt>-1 * [[getTerrainHeightASL]]</tt> at the location</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _pos = [[position]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_myLocationHomePos = [[position]] myLocation;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getPos]], [[getPosATL]], [[getPosASL]], [[getPosASLW]], [[visiblePosition]], [[getPosVisual]], [[visiblePositionASL]], [[locationPosition]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
